data.SOURCE:
@AccessControl.authorizationCheck: #NOT_REQUIRED
@EndUserText.label: 'eDocument Report'
@Metadata.ignorePropagatedAnnotations: true
define root view entity zetr_ddl_i_document_report
  as select from zetr_t_oginv as OutgoingInvoices
  //composition of target_data_source_name as _association_name
{
  key cast( 'OGINV' as zetr_e_table )                            as eDocumentType,
  key OutgoingInvoices.bukrs                                     as CompanyCode,
  key cast( substring( OutgoingInvoices.bldat, 1, 6 ) as poper ) as FiscalPeriod,
      count( distinct OutgoingInvoices.docui )                   as DocumentCount,
      @Semantics.amount.currencyCode: 'Currency'
      sum( OutgoingInvoices.wrbtr )                              as TotalAmount,
      OutgoingInvoices.waers                                     as Currency
      //    _association_name // Make association public
}
group by
  OutgoingInvoices.bukrs,
  OutgoingInvoices.bldat,
  OutgoingInvoices.waers

union

select from zetr_t_icinv as IncomingInvoices
{
  key cast( 'ICINV' as zetr_e_table )                            as eDocumentType,
  key IncomingInvoices.bukrs                                     as CompanyCode,
  key cast( substring( IncomingInvoices.bldat, 1, 6 ) as poper ) as FiscalPeriod,
      count( distinct IncomingInvoices.docui )                   as DocumentCount,
      sum( IncomingInvoices.wrbtr )                              as TotalAmount,
      IncomingInvoices.waers                                     as Currency
}
group by
  IncomingInvoices.bukrs,
  IncomingInvoices.bldat,
  IncomingInvoices.waers
/*+[internal] {
"BASEINFO":

[
"ZETR_T_ICINV",

],

}
